text: Jesusa Purificacion Levy Sonora-Poe (July 28, 1941 â€“ May 20, 2022), better known by her screen name Susan Roces (), was a Filipina actress. She was known for her roles in Ang Daigdig Ko'y Ikaw (1965), Gumising Ka Maruja (1967), Patayin Mo Sa Sindak Si Barbara (1974), Maligno and Mano Po 2: My Home (2003). Her adoptive daughter is Grace Poe. Roces died on May 20, 2022 in Manila, Philippines from a heart attack at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Negros Occidental Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors
title: Susan Roces
